Why you compress to rar this torren files, no reason??? If you want one building 20mb you must download 2.6gb stupid

@zzolee30 & everybody else that wants to use the maps for international travelling: THE BORDERS DO NOT MATCH so you will get a complete f-up route or a message saying the maps are isolated. I've just been on a road trip from Romania to Spain and I can tell for sure that the maps for Hungary, Austria, Italia, France, Spain, Swiss, Germany don't have matching borders so you can't get a route through, will have to go on the map and point a place on the road near the border and it's kind of frustrating. But better than nothing, right?
